raw_comment: We originally thought that the Northern areas getting spring so late was just due to it being in the North but after reading the info in the article saw that it was more affected by the change in climate caused by the melting of Arctic sea ice leading to an even longer winter than the already long winters in the North U.S.
ace_sentences: We originally thought that spring comes late in the northern areas because the northern areas are in the North.
After we read the information in the article, we saw another cause.
The change in climate affects the northern areas.
The melting of Arctic sea ice causes the change in climate.
The change in climate leads to a longer winter in the northern areas.
The winters in the North U.S. are already long.
The change in climate leads to an even longer winter than the already long winters in the North U.S.
